about.title: About Me
about.content1: With over 15 years of experience in video production and editing, I've worked with some of the world's biggest brands and creators. My passion is transforming raw footage into compelling visual stories that captivate audiences.
about.content2: I specialize in high-end commercial production, music videos, and cinematic content. My technical expertise combined with creative vision has resulted in multiple award-winning projects.
